# agentix-core

**Core business logic for the Agentix platform by FIDOX.**

This Python package provides core task handling utilities for AI agent workflows that integrate with the Agentix Core API (`v1`). It includes task lifecycle management, system event logging, secure credential storage via Agentix Vault, and usage reporting tools used across multiple voice or automation agents.

Install via pip:

pip install agentix-core
